action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Active and assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

We have two website accounts with WolfIQ: SGUA and PI Plus.
Unfortunately, both accounts are linked to two different people. I need myself to be administrator of both the account.
Can I have the PI Plus account, which is currently linked to Nathan Jameson, the Chairman of the company, also include myself at sree@sgua.com.au as the admin?

Please let me know of any issues.

Thanks.



Kind regards,

Sree Nair

IT Manager

1800 355 559
